au/kayeadolphson www instagram com/kadolphsondesigns ©kaye adolphson 2021 full hexagon make 349 348 for leap year 4ch join with slip_stitch to form a circle round 1 3ch 11tr into ring slip_stitch to top of 3ch round 2 3ch 1fptr around 3ch 1tr into space between stitches 1fptr around next treble_crochet 11 times slip_stitch to top of 3ch round 3 3ch 1fptr around next stitch 1tr into each of next 2 stitches 1fptr around fptr of previous row 11 times 1tr into base of 3ch slip_stitch to top of 3ch round 4 3ch 1tr into space at base of 3ch 1fptr around next fptr 1tr into each of next 2tr 1fptr around next fptr miss 1tr 3tr into space between stitches 1fptr around next fptr 5 times 1tr into each of next 2tr 1fptr around next fptr miss 1tr 1tr into space at base of 3ch slip_stitch to top of 3ch fasten_off ©kaye adolphson 2021 half hexagon make 16 18 for leap year 4ch join with slip_stitch to form a circle row 1 3ch 7tr into ring turn row 2 3ch 1tr into space between stitches 1fptr around next treble_crochet 6 times 1tr into next space 1tr into top of turning chain turn row 3 3ch 2tr into next treble_crochet 1bptr around next stitch 6 times 2tr in next treble_crochet 1tr into top of turning chain turn row 4 3ch 1tr into each of the next 2tr 1fptr round next stitch twice miss 1tr 3tr into next space between stitches 1fptr around next post stitch 1tr into each of the next 2tr 1fptr around next stitch twice 1tr into each of the next 2tr 1tr into top of turning chain fasten_off slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain 0 double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half treble htr2tog half treble two together treble_crochet treble fptr front post treble bptr back post treble dtr2tog treble_crochet two together crab work a double_crochet stitch stitch in the reverse direction ©kaye adolphson 2021 to make up sew hexagons by placing right sides together and picking up the back loop on each motif normal year 21 high row 17 wide columns leap year 22 high 1st column = 20 hexagons 2 half hexagons 17 wide ©kaye adolphson 2021 edging nb work all half_double_crochet s into back bar where possible on first 3 rounds round 1 a starting along the straight edge work half_double_crochet s evenly across to the first corner work 3htr in middle stitch of corner 1htr in each of next 6 stitches *3htr in next corner stitch 1htr in next 5 stitches htr2tog over outside stitches of each hexagon 1htr into next 5 stitches* repeat from * to * across wavy edge to next corner work 3htr in middle stitch of corner 1htr in each of next 6 stitches 3htr in next corner stitch repeat straight and wavy edges as before round 2 b work another round of half_double_crochet s into
